results.title: Effect of simvastatin on baboon endometriosis.
results.text_hl: Collectively, the present findings indicate that the inhibition of the @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonate@@@ pathway by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces the risk of developing @DISEASE_Endometriosis @DISEASE_MESH:D004715 @@@endometriosis@@@ in the primate model of this disease by decreasing the growth of @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014591 @@@endometrial lesions@@@, by modulating the expression of genes encoding for estrogen receptors, and by reducing @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@.

citations.NLM: Taylor HS, Alderman Iii M, D'Hooghe TM, Fazleabas AT, Duleba AJ. Effect of simvastatin on baboon endometriosis. Biol Reprod. 2017 Jul 1;97(1):32-38. PMID: 28637327
citations.BibTeX: @article{28637327, title={Effect of simvastatin on baboon endometriosis.}, author={Taylor HS and Alderman Iii M and D'Hooghe TM and Fazleabas AT and Duleba AJ}, journal={Biol Reprod}, volume={97}, number={1}, pages={32-38}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on retinoic acid system in primary human endometrial stromal cells and in a chimeric model of human endometriosis.
results.text_hl: Similarly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment of nude @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ bearing @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014591 @@@endometrial xenografts@@@ led to an increased expression of @GENE_CRABP2 @GENE_1382 @@@CRABP2@@@ and @GENE_STRA6 @GENE_64220 @@@STRA6@@@ proteins in @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism_Congenital_Nongoitrous_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C566852 @@@ectopic lesions@@@.

citations.NLM: Sokalska A, Anderson M, Villanueva J, Ortega I, Bruner-Tran KL, Osteen KG, Duleba AJ. Effects of simvastatin on retinoic acid system in primary human endometrial stromal cells and in a chimeric model of human endometriosis. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2013 Mar;98(3):E463-71. PMID: 23337719
citations.BibTeX: @article{23337719, title={Effects of simvastatin on retinoic acid system in primary human endometrial stromal cells and in a chimeric model of human endometriosis.}, author={Sokalska A and Anderson M and Villanueva J and Ortega I and Bruner-Tran KL and Osteen KG and Duleba AJ}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={98}, number={3}, pages={E463-71}}
